name: Dracotail Flame
effectText: Target 1 face-up Spell on the field; negate its effects (until the end of this turn), then you can place 1 "Dracotail" card from your GY or banishment on the bottom of the Deck, except "Dracotail Flame", then draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Dracotail Flame" per turn.
